root.name: Mario Artist: Communication Kit
root.description: Overview:Communications Kit is an art game for the Nintendo 64 DD. It was released June 29, 2000. It ran on a service called Radnet that allowed players to upload photos and share Paint/Polygon/Talent studio artworks with other Radnet users. The disc had content that could be unlocked for the Paint Studio. Players could also order printings of their work from Radnet.
